comments:
I have installed Eclipse 3.1M6, WebTools M4 and all the prerequisities.

I get ConcurrentModificationException whenever I start eclipse with the J2EE
perspective. This error doesn't happen if I start up with the java perspective
and then switch to the j2ee perspective.

Changed Version field given new release numbering.

Part of a mass update. Based on 9/22/2005 development review meeting, it's 
determined this was an open bug/enhancement with tartget mistakenly set to M8. 
Since this will not be in M8, I am changing to "unspecified". 

If this is an error, please correct (for example the bug really has been fixed
in M8, change back to M8, and "fixed".)
Ensure that the NavigatorActionService is protected around this case.
*** Bug 86042 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

This has been fixed in the Platform version of the Common Navigator.

WTP 1.0/1.5 will take advantage of this enhancement once the port to Platform 3.2 is underway.
